name: Robot Block Party
description:
The Silicon Valley Robotics Robot Block Party is BACK! Join us at Circuit Launch in Oakland for a Saturday full of robot demos, developer workshops, speakers, job fair, show'n'tell and most of all lots and lots of fun!

PLS SIGN UP TO ATTEND OR SHOWCASE HERE - https://robot-block-party.eventbrite.com

AGENDA (see eventbrite for updates)
  • Robot Demos (upstairs, downstairs & outside - all day)
  • Robots On Ice Teaser
  • Indoor DIY Robocar Racing (tbc)
  • Outdoor AgRobotics Rover Competition (tba)
  • Developer Workshops (tba)
  • Make Spot Dance Workshop (tbc)
  • MechLabs Robot Building Workshops (tba)
  • ROS Con Viewing (tba)
  • 3 Minute Thesis & Posters
  • Tech Talks & Engineer Office Hours
  • Investor Office Hours & Startup Pitches
  • Robojobs Job Fair
  • Women in Robotics Networking Event
  • Black in Robotics Networking Event
  • Bots & Beer Networking Event
  • Brazilian BBQ & Ice Cream Truck

What are you going to bring??? (aside from your masks of course!)

name: Book Club (new time!)
description:
Welcome back to Book Club! Our new time for weekly book club will be Friday 5-6pm PDT

Our next readings will look at the impact of technology on gender and race. The first readings are available as free downloads and we hope to invite authors to the discussion as well.

8/27/21 | 17:00 PDT | More Work for Mother | Ruth Schwartz Cowan
9/3/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
9/10/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
2 week gap |  |  | 
10/1/21 | 17:00 PDT | Data Feminism | Catherine D'Ignazio & Lauren Klein 
10/8/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
10/15/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
10/22/21 | 17:00 PDT | UNESCO Report on Voice Assistants "I'd Blush If I Could" | 
10/29/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
11/5/21 | 17:00 PDT | The New Breed | Kate Darling
11/12/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
11/19/21 | 17:00 PDT |  | 
11/26/21 | 17:00 PDT | Race After Technology | Ruha Benjamin
12/3/21 | 17:00 PDT | or Race, Gender & Robots | Ayanna Howard
12/10/21 | 17:00 PDT |  |

name: WiR Organizers & Volunteers Get Together
description:
If you're helping Women in Robotics or interested in volunteering then this meeting is for you. 
Let's create more local chapters and events, more online activities, more stories and inspiring content. Bring your ideas, your enthusiasm and your questions.
